p: Potatoes ( Solanum tuberosum L., Mozart variety) choice was based on their frying aptitude and availability in the local market (Porto, Portugal; potatoes origin: France). Potatoes were manually peeled, cut into 1 cm cubes, washed in plain water, and drained before being processed. No pre‐fried potatoes were used in this study, as the incorporated fat would bias the results. The vegetable oils included commercial soybean oil (SO), sunflower oil (SFO), and olive oil (OO), all available in the local market, and canola oil (CO) acquired from international market (Pforzheim, Germany), with their chemical composition detailed in Supporting Information Table S1.
